example.name: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: Beyond that misty gray of the rain , he saw [the stretching hutment]-1, low diminutive log cabins , chinked *trace*-1 with mud , with doorways [0] a man would have [*-2] to crouch [*] to get through [*T*-1] , with roofs of tenting laid [*] over boughs or boards from hardtack boxes , or fence rails , with cranky chimneys of sticks and dried mud .
